languages.text: Устроенное героическим отрядом Комиссара побоище на арене Губительной жажды было подобно яростной вспышке, краткой, но достаточно мощной, чтобы ее заметили. Известие о дерзкой выходке расползлось по Темному городу. Дабы пресечь угрозу беспорядков, архонты казнили бесчисленное множество невольников, годами томившихся в казематах шпилей, и отправились к человеческим мирам на поиски новых слуг.

The bloodbath unleashed by the Commissar's squad in the Arena of the Fatal Thirst was like a sudden flash — short, yet powerful enough to be seen. News of the audacious stunt spread throughout the Dark City. To stifle the threat of riots, the Archons executed innumerable prisoners who had been rotting away for years in the spires' dungeons. They then ventured to the human worlds in search of new servants.
languages.original_text: Устроенное героическим отрядом Комиссара побоище на арене Губительной жажды было подобно яростной вспышке, краткой, но достаточно мощной, чтобы ее заметили. Известие о дерзкой выходке расползлось по Темному городу. Дабы пресечь угрозу беспорядков, архонты казнили бесчисленное множество невольников, годами томившихся в казематах шпилей, и отправились к человеческим мирам на поиски новых слуг.

traits.locale_text: The bloodbath that the Commissar's squad made on the arena of the Fatal Thirst was like a raging flash — short yet powerful enough to be seen. News of this insolent stunt spread through the Dark City. To nip the threat of riots in the bud, Archons executed innumerable prisoners, rotting away for years in the dungeons of the spires. After which, they ventured to the Human worlds looking for new servants.

News of this insolent stunt spread through the Dark City. To nip the threat of riots in the bud, Archons executed innumerable prisoners, rotting away for years in the dungeons of the spires. After which, they ventured to the Human worlds looking for new servants.

They then ventured to the human worlds in search of new servants.

News of the audacious stunt spread throughout the Dark City. To stifle the threat of riots, the Archons executed innumerable prisoners who had been rotting away for years in the spires' dungeons. They then ventured to the human worlds in search of new servants.

They then ventured to the human worlds in search of new servants.

languages.text: 政委小队在致命饥渴竞技场的屠戮之举，就像一道突如其来的闪光一样，虽然短暂，却无比耀眼，足以让所有人看到。这胆大包天的冒犯之举传遍了整座黑暗之城。为了遏制暴乱，执政官们处决了无数在尖塔的地牢里腐烂多年的囚犯，随后前往人类的世界寻找新的仆人。
languages.original_text: The bloodbath unleashed by the Commissar's squad in the Arena of the Fatal Thirst was like a sudden flash — short, yet powerful enough to be seen. News of the audacious stunt spread throughout the Dark City. To stifle the threat of riots, the Archons executed innumerable prisoners who had been rotting away for years in the spires' dungeons. They then ventured to the human worlds in search of new servants.

traits.locale_text: 政委小队在致命饥渴竞技场的屠戮之举，就像一道突如其来的闪光一样，虽然短暂，却无比耀眼，足以让所有人看到。这无礼的冒犯之举传遍了整座黑暗之城。为了遏制暴乱，执政官们处决了无数在尖塔的地牢里腐烂多年的囚犯，随后前往人类的世界寻找新的仆人。

languages.text: Das Blutbad, das der Trupp des Kommissars in der Arena des Fatalen Dursts anrichtete, war wie ein plötzlicher Blitz — kurz, aber mächtig genug, um gesehen zu werden. Die Nachricht von der Dreistigkeit verbreitete sich in der Dunklen Stadt. Um die Gefahr von Aufständen einzudämmen, richteten die Archonten unzählige Gefangene hin, die seit Jahren in den Verliesen der Türme vor sich hingesiecht hatten. Dann brachen sie zu den menschlichen Welten auf, um neue Diener zu beschaffen.
languages.original_text: The bloodbath unleashed by the Commissar's squad in the Arena of the Fatal Thirst was like a sudden flash — short, yet powerful enough to be seen. News of the audacious stunt spread throughout the Dark City. To stifle the threat of riots, the Archons executed innumerable prisoners who had been rotting away for years in the spires' dungeons. They then ventured to the human worlds in search of new servants.

traits.locale_text: Das Blutbad, das der Trupp des Kommissars in der Arena des Fatalen Dursts anrichtete, war wie ein plötzlicher Blitz — kurz, aber mächtig genug, um gesehen zu werden. Die Nachricht von der Dreistigkeit verbreitete sich in der Dunklen Stadt. Um die Gefahr von Aufständen einzudämmen, richteten die Archonten unzählige Gefangene hin, die seit Jahren in den Verliesen der Türme vor sich hingesiecht hatten. Dann brachen sie zu den menschlichen Welten auf, um neue Diener zu beschaffen.

languages.text: Le bain de sang provoqué par l'escouade du commissaire dans l'arène de la Soif Fatale fit l'effet d'un coup de tonnerre : bref, mais assez puissant pour être remarqué. La nouvelle du coup audacieux se répandit dans toute la Cité Crépusculaire. Pour étouffer le risque d'émeutes, les archontes exécutèrent d'innombrables prisonniers qui croupissaient depuis des années dans les cachots des tours, puis ils partirent à la recherche de nouveaux serviteurs dans les mondes humains.
languages.original_text: The bloodbath unleashed by the Commissar's squad in the Arena of the Fatal Thirst was like a sudden flash — short, yet powerful enough to be seen. News of the audacious stunt spread throughout the Dark City. To stifle the threat of riots, the Archons executed innumerable prisoners who had been rotting away for years in the spires' dungeons. They then ventured to the human worlds in search of new servants.

traits.locale_text: Le bain de sang provoqué par l'escouade du commissaire dans l'arène de la Soif Fatale fit l’effet d’un coup de tonnerre : bref, mais assez puissant pour être remarqué. La nouvelle de coup insolent se répandit dans toute la Cité Crépusculaire. Pour étouffer le risque d'émeutes, les archontes exécutèrent d’innombrables prisonniers qui croupissaient depuis des années dans les cachots des tours, puis ils partirent à la recherche de nouveaux serviteurs dans les mondes humains.

languages.text: El baño de sangre que ocasionó el escuadrón del Comisario en la arena de la Sed Letal fue como un destello repentino: efímero, pero tan potente como para ser visto. Las nuevas de esta desfachatez se extendieron por la Ciudad Siniestra. Para reducir la amenaza de revueltas, los Arcontes ejecutaron a innumerables prisioneros que llevaban años pudriéndose en las mazmorras de las agujas. Después, atacaron mundos humanos en busca de nuevos sirvientes.
languages.original_text: The bloodbath unleashed by the Commissar's squad in the Arena of the Fatal Thirst was like a sudden flash — short, yet powerful enough to be seen. News of the audacious stunt spread throughout the Dark City. To stifle the threat of riots, the Archons executed innumerable prisoners who had been rotting away for years in the spires' dungeons. They then ventured to the human worlds in search of new servants.

traits.locale_text: El baño de sangre que ocasionó el escuadrón del Comisario en la arena de la Sed Letal fue como un destello repentino: efímero, pero tan potente como para ser visto. Las nuevas de esta insolencia se extendieron por la Ciudad Siniestra. Para reducir la amenaza de revueltas, los Arcontes ejecutaron a innumerables prisioneros que llevaban años pudriéndose en las mazmorras de las agujas. Después, atacaron mundos humanos en busca de nuevos sirvientes.

languages.text: コミッサーの部隊によって「宿命の渇き」のアリーナで繰り広げられた惨劇は、不意打ちの閃光のようで、短くも、注目を得るには十分強力だった。この大胆な行為のニュースは仄暗き都中に広まった。暴動の脅威を押しとどめるため、アーコンたちは長らく尖塔の地下牢で腐っていた無数の囚人たちを処刑した。そしてその後、彼らは新たな召使いを求めて人間界へと飛び出した。
languages.original_text: The bloodbath unleashed by the Commissar's squad in the Arena of the Fatal Thirst was like a sudden flash — short, yet powerful enough to be seen. News of the audacious stunt spread throughout the Dark City. To stifle the threat of riots, the Archons executed innumerable prisoners who had been rotting away for years in the spires' dungeons. They then ventured to the human worlds in search of new servants.

traits.locale_text: コミッサーの部隊によって「宿命の渇き」のアリーナで繰り広げられた惨劇は、不意打ちの閃光のようで、短くも、注目を得るには十分強力だった。この大胆な行為のニュースは仄暗き都中に広まった。暴動の脅威を押しとどめるため、アーコンたちは長らく尖塔の地下牢で腐っていた無数の囚人たちを処刑した。そしてその後、彼らは新たな召使いを求めて人間界へと飛び出した。

languages.text: Komiser'in mangasının Ölüme Susamışlığın Arenası'nda yaptığı katliam; ani bir yıldırım gibiydi, kısa sürse de gücü görülmeye değerdi. Bu cüretkâr hamleye dair haberler, Kara Şehir'de yayıldı. Arkonlar, ayaklanma tehdidini bastırmak adına kulelerin zindanlarında yıllardır çürüyen sayısız mahkûmu idam etti, ardından da yeni hizmetkârlar arayışında insan dünyalarına yol aldılar.
languages.original_text: The bloodbath unleashed by the Commissar's squad in the Arena of the Fatal Thirst was like a sudden flash — short, yet powerful enough to be seen. News of the audacious stunt spread throughout the Dark City. To stifle the threat of riots, the Archons executed innumerable prisoners who had been rotting away for years in the spires' dungeons. They then ventured to the human worlds in search of new servants.

traits.locale_text: Komiser'in mangasının Ölüme Susamışlık Arenası'nda ortaya koyduğu katliam, ani bir yıldırım gibiydi. Kısa sürdü ancak gücü görülmeye değerdi. Bu cüretkâr hamleye dair haberler Kara Şehir boyunca yayıldı. Arkonlar, ayaklanma tehdidini bastırmak adına kulelerin zindanlarında yıllardır çürüyen sayısız mahkûmu idam ettiler, ardından da yeni hizmetkârlar aramak için insan dünyalarına yol aldılar.
